page.title: 12Youth Organisations (2)
page.content: CUB SCOUTS.Scouts wear a uniform which tells people what you are.A Cub's motto is"Be prepared" which means keep alert. A cub is honest, thinks of others before himself & never tells lies.He tries to do his duty to God & to the Queen & to help others to keep the Cub Scout Law & attend regularly.Cubs play games, do work & make things. When he gets his Link Badge he can join Scouts. He has to work hard to become a Sixer or Seconder & to get badges(G.Reddick). 1stBRACKLEY GIRLS' BRIGADE.This is only for girls but there's a Boys' Brigade as well.We have a law & a promise & motto. The motto is "Seek, serve & follow Christ". We wear a hat,tie, white shirt, white knee socks, tunic, black shoes & blazer. We do badge work, play games& make things. It's a bit like school but a little bit different. (C.Hutchinson).
